elements.name: q1
elements.title: Which statement best describes a Net Worth Statement?
choices: A month-by-month history of income and expenses.
A snapshot of assets minus liabilities at a point in time.
A forecast of investment returns over the next year.
elements.correctAnswer: A snapshot of assets minus liabilities at a point in time.

elements.name: q2
elements.title: Which action most directly improves cashflow?
choices: Rebalancing a portfolio from stocks to bonds.
